Sentencas: Generally, La1 - xSrxCoyFe1 - yO3 - delta-phases (LSCF) as mixed ionic electronic conductors (MIEC) are applied as electrode material in solid oxide fuel cells and as oxygen separation membranes in zero CO2 emission power plants.
Titulo: Towards designing La1-xSrxCoyFe1-yO3-d with enhanced phase stability: Role of the defect structure

Sentencas: LSCF phases are synthesized using magnetron sputtering from a compound target.
Titulo: Towards designing La1-xSrxCoyFe1-yO3-d with enhanced phase stability: Role of the defect structure

Sentencas: The chemical composition could be controlled via synthesis temperature variations as the sticking coefficient is a function of temperature.
Titulo: Towards designing La1-xSrxCoyFe1-yO3-d with enhanced phase stability: Role of the defect structure

Sentencas: With decreased synthesis temperature a significant change in chemical composition is observed resulting in an increased A-site deficiency.
Titulo: Towards designing La1-xSrxCoyFe1-yO3-d with enhanced phase stability: Role of the defect structure

Sentencas: This leads to an extension of the cubic stability range to temperatures as low as 450 degrees C. Thus, structural transition from the low-temperature rhombohedral modification to the high-temperature cubic structure, accompanied by considerable volume change, will be suppressed.
Titulo: Towards designing La1-xSrxCoyFe1-yO3-d with enhanced phase stability: Role of the defect structure

Sentencas: This significantly lowers mechanical stresses on the MIEC-material during application and is expected to increase the lifetime of the cells and membranes.
Titulo: Towards designing La1-xSrxCoyFe1-yO3-d with enhanced phase stability: Role of the defect structure

Sentencas: The experimental results are consistent with ab initio density functional theory calculations performed on A-site deficient as well as fully stoichiometric LSCF phases.
Titulo: Towards designing La1-xSrxCoyFe1-yO3-d with enhanced phase stability: Role of the defect structure

Sentencas: A-site deficient cubic phases are more stable than the stoichiometric phases.
Titulo: Towards designing La1-xSrxCoyFe1-yO3-d with enhanced phase stability: Role of the defect structure

Sentencas: No significant difference in Young's modulus is obtained.
Titulo: Towards designing La1-xSrxCoyFe1-yO3-d with enhanced phase stability: Role of the defect structure
